lead_paragraph: Paul Mathurin, who was wounded during a confrontation with the police in Prospect-Lefferts Gardens on Sunday, was arrested on gun and drug possession charges.

byline.contributor: Rick Rojas and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

headline.print_headline: Witness Accounts Differ in a Police Shooting
headline.main: Brooklyn Man Arrested a Day After Being Shot by Officers

snippet: Paul Mathurin, who was wounded during a confrontation with the police in Prospect-Lefferts Gardens on Sunday, was arrested on gun and drug possession charges....
abstract: Witnesses give conflicting accounts of incident in which police shot and wounded Paul Mathurin, who was arrested on weapons and drug charges after reportedly threatening people with gun in Prospect-Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn; some claim Mathurin had no gun and did not fire shots that were heard.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Isaacs, Wayne (New York, NY, Police Officer)
